  • Method Details

    • onModAppointmentCancelBtnClicked

      void onModAppointmentCancelBtnClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Action even for when the cancel button is clicked. Discards all changes being made and sends the user back to the Appointment View FXML.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onModAppointmentSaveBtnClicked

      void onModAppointmentSaveBtnClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      Action event for when the user clicks the save button in the Appointment Modify Form FMXL. Grabs all current fields and updates the currently selected appointment using the Appointment Update method. If there is an error in the form, throws an error to the user to fill out the forms correctly.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • sendAppointment

      public void sendAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Grabs data form the Appointment view FXML of the current selected customer and populates the Appointment modify FXML with the appropriate values.
      Parameters:
      appointment - Appointment class of selected Appointment in the Appointment view FXML.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initial setup for Appointment Modify FXML. Pre-populates the combo boxes. The LAMBDA EXPRESSIONS also helps populates the time combo box to increment every 15 minutes.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
